name: Battle of chess - Fantasty strategy game
name_original: Battle of chess - Fantasty strategy game
description:
This game is auto chess game with a big change in it, it is with 3d characters of chess. while playing the game unlock characters. This game is a fantasy chess game there are mysterious characters. Play the game with the computer and test your skills with AAA graphics.

  • The game can help you improve your skills in the chess.
  • It will also help in improving your IQ high.
  • It will also help you develop your acknowledging skills high.
  • The game comes with characters which makes game different for others and keep you interested in it with other benefits.

 

Try the game now for further good experiences and check it out from a closer look and enjoy your good time with improving skills.

 

Play and Learn!
